programme.title: MST3K: The Final Sacrifice
programme.desc: With the help of a map and a drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta.

programme.title: MST3K: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank
programme.desc: A weather tech's mind gets trapped in a computer and Pearl establishes her own public TV pledge program.

programme.title: MST3K: Mitchell
programme.desc: A sleazy, incompetent detective tries to simultaneously take down heroin dealers and a socialite.

programme.title: MST3K: Beyond Atlantis
programme.desc: A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).

programme.title: MST3K: Hamlet
programme.desc: A dark and dreary German production of one of Shakespeare's greatest plays fills the Satellite Of Love.

programme.title: MST3K: The Girl In Lovers Lane
programme.desc: Joel and the 'bots watch a hobo melodrama called The Girl in Lovers Lane (1960).

programme.title: MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come
programme.desc: Emily's crew watch three humans defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

programme.title: MST3K: Stranded In Space
programme.desc: The gang have a gag-weapon war with the Mads and watch an unsuccessful TV pilot about an astronaut stuck.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts
programme.desc: A short about the art of safe and courteous driving.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts
programme.desc: We learn what is being done 'today' to create the Chicken of Tomorrow.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts
programme.sub-title: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 1: Beneath The Ocean Floor
programme.desc: A scientist and a reporter discover the lost city of Atlantis, a technologically advanced society.

programme.title: MST3K: Werewolf
programme.desc: After digging up strange bones, a man becomes a werewolf.

programme.title: MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus
programme.desc: Joel and the 'bots suffer through First Spaceship on Venus (1960).

programme.title: MST3K: Boggy Creek II: And The Legend Continues
programme.desc: A professor and his students camp out in the rural Arkansas swamp, hoping to find a Bigfoot-like creature.

programme.title: MST3K: Hercules Against The Moon Men
programme.desc: The heroic muscleman takes on rock men and the bad queen of Samar.
